summary: A small town infestation of crawling alien foreheads that begin attaching to people and taking them over collides with a scientist's experiments to extract foreheadazine and things go horribly horribly wrong.
cast: Daniel Roebuck|Susan McConnell|Fay Masterson|Andrew Parks|H.M. Wynant|Brian Howe|Dan Conroy|Alison Martin|Trish Geiger|Jennifer Blaire|Larry Blamire|Dick Miller|Robert Deveau|Betty Garrett|James Karen|Kevin McCarthy|Ray Harryhausen|Paul Bunnell|Michael McConnohie|Christine Romeo|Michael Schlesinger|James Swift|Chuck Williams
title: Trail of the Screaming Forehead
